strings.page_1:
INVALID RESULT:

The test should be considered invalid if no bands appear on the device.
strings.page_1a:
INVALID RESULT:

The test should also be considered invalid if only test bands (Pan and/or Pf) appear and no control band appears.
strings.page_1b:
INVALID RESULT:

Repeat the test with a new device ensuring that the test procedure has been followed accurately.
strings.page_2: Appearance of coloured bands of any intensity (faint to dark) at 'Pf' and/or 'Pan' should be considered as positive result
strings.page_3:
NEGATIVE for malaria:

Only one pink-purple band appears in the control window 'C'.
strings.page_4:
POSITIVE for P. falciparum

In addition to the control band, a pink-purple band appear only at region 'Pf' in the test window 'T'.
strings.page_5:
POSITIVE for Other species (P .vivax or P. malariae or P. ovale):

In addition to the control band, one pink-purple band appears only at region 'Pan' in the test window 'T'.
strings.page_6:
POSITIVE for Mixed infection (P. falciparum and P .vivax or P. malariae or P. ovale):

In addition to the control band, two pink-purple bands appear at regions 'Pf' and 'Pan' in the test window 'T'
